Classes in org.apache.hivemind.impl that implement ModuleDescriptorProvider
 class XmlModuleDescriptorProvider
          Implementation of the ModuleDescriptorProvider interface which uses the DescriptorParser to provide module descriptors defined in XML.
 

Methods in org.apache.hivemind.impl with parameters of type ModuleDescriptorProvider
 void RegistryBuilder.addModuleDescriptorProvider(ModuleDescriptorProvider provider)
          Adds a ModuleDescriptorProvider as a source for module descriptors to this RegistryBuilder.
 

Uses of ModuleDescriptorProvider in org.apache.hivemind.servlet

protected  ModuleDescriptorProvider HiveMindFilter.getModuleDescriptorProvider(ClassResolver resolver)

Uses of ModuleDescriptorProvider in org.apache.hivemind.test
 

Methods in org.apache.hivemind.test with parameters of type ModuleDescriptorProvider
protected  Registry HiveMindTestCase.buildFrameworkRegistry(ModuleDescriptorProvider customProvider)
          Builds a registry, containing only the modules delivered by the specified ModuleDescriptorProvider, plus the master module descriptor (i.e., those visible on the classpath).
